main event: A UFO report submitted to Project Blue Book regarding a sighting of an unidentified round, bright silver object moving slightly above the horizon.
interesting points: The object was observed moving with a slight swaying motion for about 15 seconds before disappearing., No sound was noted during the sighting., The sighting occurred on or around 3 November 1959., Investigations failed to find any explanations for the sighting., The observation involved coordination with military personnel in the vicinity of Minot.
